dialog.text: there are grass, clouds, trees and sky (a sunset) in the image.
Yes. How much space does the grass occupy?
the grass takes up bottom one third, the tree takes up about one fourth in the middle, and the sky takes up the rest. the sun is right at the middle. And some cloud at the top of the image
Are the clouds in chunks? How big are they?
just a few thin layer of cloud. it covers the whole sky. but still can see the blue sky and the sunset
Is the top of the trees flat or does it slope down to the left or right?
the overall shape of the trees are like a long rectangle as the background. in the front, there are two main one on the left and one on the right
Yes. Can you take a peek and tell me how it looks?
the trees are short than you have. you can reduce the size by half. The sky should be more cloudy. and there is a sunset the the middle
the color tone of the image is: top most is blue, middle is orange (sunset), bottom is green
I cannot do much about the sunset. Can you take a last peek?
i don't have any more peek. I will end it.
